string.text: Solders of the regular military units guard passages to the closed Zone areas. They patrol perimeter shooting down \nmutants and catching marodeurs and poachers. S.W.A.T. is an elite army unit, land in Zone to lead special and rescue \noperations.

Soldiers veterans have special training and a lot of equipment. They are well armed. Can be seen rarely. The army is 
interested in studying results and reasons of the meltdown drawing maps of the Zone anomaly areas. For these 
purposes they use military stalkers hired from soldier's elite. Military stalkers walk alone or in groups up to five persons. 
They meet common stalkers with gunfire. Military stalkers usually are sent to interested objects such as the place of 
great disaster or lost SRI. For example military stalkers on the territory of the SRI "Agroprom" study residual radiation 
and local anomalies.

Mobile-lab looks like small metal bunker with tiny toned windows. In the front part is sluice compartment. The laboratory is 
total waterproof and is able to stand any demages as well chemical as phusical. It is transported into the Zone by cargo 
helicopter. The lab is equipped with all necessary stuff to maintain life within several months. There's call button with 
integrated videocam on the outside of the sluice door. Friendly stalkers are let into the sluice compartment where trade 
and negotiations happen.Admission into the laboratry itself is prohibited.

The representatives of the criminal world came into the zone for easy money. They haven't grounded yet but disturb \nstalkers already. Criminals are grouped in small gangs with no comprehention among them. Mostly bandits are in the Zone \noutskirt area, apprehending to go to the center.

"Duty" is a military grouping notable for its strict discipline and popular principles. They virtualy live according army 
regulations. "Duty" is the only who doesn't deliver artifacts in the common world, exept national defence industry. They 
consider their mission to protect the word from Zone influence. The members of the "Duty" think they are chernobyl 
sweepers and monster destroyers. That's why they hunt dark stalkers and other scums destroying mutant's nests and 
hives. They've been in enmity with "Freedom" grouping for a long time.

They are anarchists, madcaps and freedom-lovers consider themselves freedom fighters. They fight against army and 
government, their purpose-make the Zone like freedom reserve. The members of this grouping consider information 
about Zone events to become public property. They contest military monopoly as for possessing Chernobyl secrets. And 
when it is truth Monolith can make wishes come true, they should open the Zone for free researchers. They fight against 
"Duty" attacks army posts, destroy military stalker expeditions. Anarchists adress each other like "free stalke"'.
Misterious grouping considered to be a legend. They can help to get "read of a problem" if you pay them. According \nrumours their shelter is right in the Zone center.

The group of stalkers by organisation remins religious sect. Its representatives believe in the Zone center situated 
unearthly evolutionary module crystall Monolith. The most stalkers hate Monolith followers consider them to be insane. 
From the times of its formation they have been constantly hinder stalkers from moving into the Zone center, condsider 
Monolith could be destroyed. "We woun't let anybody, any kind of your interference can lead to final Monolith death. We 
shoot down anyone who approaches less then 30 meters."
Here is the speech of the veteran stalker in the "Stalker" bar:" They are crazy, who believe in Monolith, they cry out 
about it but noone knows what is in the Zone center. Unvisable crystal fallen from heaven! Ha...Ha.... I think one of the 
secret laboratory exploded. Someone even told he worked there. Of course you can't bomb the Zone, the radiation can 
be spreaded all over the world, so the reaction can destroy half of Europe"
It is rumoured Monolith members havebig base somewhere near the Zone center, but noione knows its presize location, 
exept grouping members.

Группа темных сталкеров - «Грех», это зомбированая группа сталкеров. Когда-то члены этой группировки были религиозными фанатиками, которые верили в божественную сущность Зоны, в последнее искупление человечества. Конфликт со всеми группами. Атакуют любых сталкеров. Темные сталкеры одеты в темные плащи с сильно надвинутыми капюшонами, так что не видно лица. Если задрать капюшон, то откроется лысая голова с кровавыми дырами, вырванных глаз.
Своеобразные сталкеры экологи. Изучают зону, ищут метод излечить мир от этой язвы. Ко всем группировкам относятся нейтрально.

I went with Gunslinger and Hampback towards the Zone center. It is known Gunslinger was lost and Ghoust turned back. 
He went to mobile scientist's camp on Jantar. Weird guy, tall big-nosed taciturn person. He was good shooter and could 
steal through everything. Thay say he killed "Last day"gang leader.

He isn't saint and isn't scum, that's why respected by stalkers. They say he hides in the Zone away from his dark past. \nAfter getting into the anomaly became lamp, and decided to change his profile. He managed a bar not far from the \n"Duty" which became the famous place for the veterans. Bartender has many contacts as well in the Zon as outside it.

He used to trade for many years. He sold colour pencils in the kinder garden. He sold chewing gum in the school. He sold \nlight drugs in the institute. As the Zone appeared he realized he could earn good money. He is remarkable for his ability \nto put right good trade relations with all kind of clients.
